About Me

I'm a final-year Computer Science student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I've developed several AI projects, including intelligent resume screening systems, smart waste classification, and sign language recognition tools.

Currently exploring opportunities in AI Engineering, with a strong focus on deploying real-time applications using Python, TensorFlow, OpenCV, and NLP frameworks. I'm passionate about building AI solutions that solve real-world problems and make a meaningful impact.

Apart from coding, I enjoy tech blogging, exploring new AI tools, participating in hackathons, and sharing what I learn with the developer community through open-source contributions.

Featured Projects

📄
NLP BERT Streamlit

Intelligent Resume Screening System

Built a Streamlit web app that extracts text from PDFs and ranks resumes by matching job descriptions using BERT embeddings and keyword-based skill scoring. Simulates recruiter logic for accurate candidate-job matching.

95% Match Accuracy
500+ Resumes Processed
🗂️
CNN EfficientNet Streamlit

Smart Waste Classification System

Developed a deep learning model using EfficientNetB0 to classify waste into hazardous, organic, and recyclable. Achieved 96% accuracy; deployed a real-time prediction interface using Streamlit.

96% Accuracy
10K+ Images Trained
🤏
MediaPipe CNN OpenCV

Sign Language Recognition System

Built a real-time hand gesture recognition system using MediaPipe for hand landmarks and CNN for gesture classification. Achieved 100% accuracy on gestures A–E with live webcam-based predictions.

100% Recognition Rate
30fps Real-time Processing
🎯
LLM Skill Matching Streamlit

AI Virtual Career Counselor

Designed a prototype career guidance system using LLM and skill-based matching to recommend suitable roles and learning paths for career development.

90% Match Accuracy
200+ Career Paths
💰
Logistic Regression SHAP Streamlit

Loan Default Prediction System

Built a predictive model to determine the likelihood of loan default and explained model predictions using SHAP values for transparent decision-making.

88% Prediction Accuracy
5K+ Loans Analyzed
